content: materials purl soho s plein air 2 67% merino wool and 33% organically grown cotton each skein is 218 yards/ 100 grams - main color mc 6 9 skeins approximately 1170 1810 total yards required - contrast color 1 cc1 3 4 skeins approximately 540 870 total yards required - contrast color 2 cc2 2 3 skeins approximately 360 595 total yards required you ll also need… - us 5 3 75 mm 32- or 40-inch circular needles 3 depending on size you are making - stitch holder 4 or scrap yarn samples we used mc heirloom white for both samples for the cc s we used red birch + sweet apricot for one sample and purple hellebore + lavender heath for the other gauge 21 stitches and 42 row 21 garter ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch sizes crib throw finished dimensions approximately 36 inches wide x 46 inches long 45 inches wide x 57 inches long samples we knit both of our blankets in the crib size designed by purl soho designers gaby bush 6 and gianna mueller 7 and inspired by the bright stripes blanket by purl soho founder and co-owner joelle hoverson 8 click here 9 to see even more of gianna s designs 2 https //www purlsoho com/plein-air html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23859 5 https //www purlsoho com/plein-air html 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gaby-bush-for-purl-soho/ 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/joelle-hoverson-for-purl-soho/ 9 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
